title: 美全球宗教自由报告：2019年数千名法轮功学员被迫害，许多人被强摘器官
contents:
原文如下：
UNITED STATES COMMISSION ON INTERNATIONAL RELIGIOUS FREEDOM

According to reports, thousands of Falun Gong practitioners were arrested during 2019 for practicing the movement’s meditation exercises or distributing literature about their beliefs. Human rights advocates and scientists presented evidence that the practice of harvesting organs from prisoners—many of whom are believed to be Falun Gong practitioners—continued on a significant scale. In addition, there were widespread reports that authorities across China demolished Mahayana Buddhist, Daoist, and Confucian statues it claimed were “unauthorized.”
https://www.uscirf.gov/sites/default/files/USCIRF%202020%20Annual%20Report_42720_new_0.pdf

明慧网报道：
4月28日，美国国际宗教自由委员会（USCIRF）发布2020年度全球宗教自由报告。报告说，中国的宗教自由状况继续恶化，中共继续大规模强摘法轮功学员器官。

报告说，2019年，中共政权利用高科技对整个国家实施监控，通过人脸识别和人工智能技术监控有信仰的民众。由于中共对信仰自由的严重迫害，中国连续21年被列入“特别关注国”。

据报道，2019年，数千名法轮功修炼者因打坐炼功，或派发真相资料被抓捕。人权倡导者和科学家提供的证据表明，中共继续大规模的从被关押者身上强摘器官，许多受害人是法轮功学员。
